zebra4j

Class PuzzleBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • zebra4j.PuzzleBuilder

  • @NotThreadSafe
public class PuzzleBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder for BasicPuzzle

    Unlike directly constructing a puzzle, the builder validates if the provided attribute sets and facts are consistent and valid.

    See Also:
    Demo for example usage

      • addFact

        public PuzzleBuilder addFact(Fact fact)
        Adds a fact to the puzzle under construction.

        Add the sets of the attribute that the fact refers to in advance.

        Parameters:
        fact - required, must apply to the attribute sets already added. See Fact.appliesTo(BasicPuzzle)
        Returns:
        the builder itself for chaining

      • build

        public BasicPuzzle build()
        Returns:
        the constructed puzzle
